Monkeypox Data Explorer: Visualizing the data produced by the Global.health team on the 2022 monkeypox outbreak.
Monkeypox: Cumulative confirmed cases, by date of confirmation
column3: Cases are shown by the date on which they were confirmed by a test.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Cumulative confirmed cases, by date of report
column3: Cases are shown by the date on which they were announced by public health authorities.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Cumulative confirmed & suspected cases, by date of report
column3: Cases are shown by the date on which they were announced by public health authorities.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Daily confirmed cases, by date of confirmation
column3: 7-day rolling average. Cases are shown by the date on which they were confirmed by a test.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Daily confirmed cases, by date of report
column3: 7-day rolling average. Cases are shown by the date on which they were announced by public health authorities.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Daily confirmed & suspected cases, by date of report
column3: 7-day rolling average. Cases are shown by the date on which they were announced by public health authorities.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Daily confirmed cases, by date of confirmation
column3: Cases are shown by the date on which they were confirmed by a test.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Daily confirmed cases, by date of report
column3: Cases are shown by the date on which they were announced by public health authorities.

Monkeypox Data Explorer: Monkeypox: Daily confirmed & suspected cases, by date of report

column6: Data produced by the 'Global.health' team — available at github.com/globaldothealth/monkeypox
column8:
This data is compiled exclusively from publicly-available sources, and is collated by the team at global.health.
Their data is updated as new information is being reported. We fetch the latest version of the data every morning (UK time), and include data up to the previous day.
Sources for each case are listed here.

Please check permissions before publishing this data and refer back to each source and the global.health team if you decide to so: Global.health Monkeypox (accessed on YYYY-MM-DD).

A data dictionary and machine readable files are available on GitHub. Should you identify any inconsistencies in the data or have additional information or questions, please get in touch here.
